title: Task 0: Project Setup

title: Fix: errcheck failure in CLI seg.Close()
description:
golangci-lint errcheck reports unchecked error on line 38 of cmd/sat-cli/main.go.

File: cmd/sat-cli/main.go:38
Current: defer seg.Close()
Fix: Use deferred closure that logs the error

This is blocking CI lint checks.

title: Task 8: Session Pool
close_reason: Session pool implemented with channel-based pooling, context cancellation, proper cleanup

title: Refactor: Pool.Close() should aggregate all session close errors
description:
File: inference/pool.go:91-97

Current implementation only returns the last error if multiple sessions fail to close. Should use errors.Join() to aggregate all errors, matching the pattern already used in sat.go:Close().

This improves debugging when multiple session cleanups fail.

- Document which linters are enabled
- Ensure consistent linting across CI and local development
